_meta.description: Complete mock job data for 25 Friendship Lane - TCS Woodwork ERP

customer.name: Trottier Fine Woodworking
customer.comment: Premier millwork contractor on Nantucket. Long-term partner for high-end residential projects.

project.name: 25 Friendship Lane Kitchen & Pantry
project.description: Full kitchen cabinetry and pantry for Nantucket residence. Level 4 paint grade cabinets for kitchen, Level 1 stain grade for pantry. Includes island with seating overhang.
project._comment_stage_gates: Project starts at DISCOVERY stage - all gates null, ready to test advancement
project.initial_consultation_notes: Site visit with Jeremy Trottier. Reviewed existing kitchen layout, discussed material preferences (paint grade for kitchen, stain grade white oak for pantry). Customer provided architectural PDFs. Access code for gated community obtained.

project_addresses.notes: Contact Trottier Fine Woodworking for site access. Gated community - need code.

pdf_document.notes: Complete architectural package. Pages: Cover, Plan View, Overview Elevations, Sink Wall, Fridge Wall, Pantry, Island, Countertops.

pdf_pages.extracted_text: 25 Friendship Lane - Kitchen & Pantry Cabinetry Package

page_metadata.title: Cover Page
page_metadata.notes: Project: 25 Friendship Lane, Nantucket, MA. Kitchen Cabinetry. Client: Jeremy Trottier (Trottier Fine Woodworking). Designer: J. Garcia. Revision 4 dated 9/27/25. Summary: Tier 2 Cabinetry 11.5 LF, Tier 4 Cabinetry 35.25 LF, Floating Shelves 4 LF, Millwork Countertops 11 SF.

pdf_pages.extracted_text: Floor Plan - Kitchen and Pantry Layout

page_metadata.title: Plan View
page_metadata.notes: Floor plan showing Kitchen and NEW WALK-IN PANTRY. Cabinet runs: Sink Wall, Fridge Wall (SubZero DET3650RID), Island, Pantry walls. Features: Rev-a-Shelf 4WDKB1 Knife Block, Lemans II 6930140150 corner storage, Double Recycle drawer, Broom/vacuum storage. Construction notes: Remove existing baseboard heaters, half wall, non-load bearing wall. 2x3 wall framing - leave sheetrock off pantry wall.

pdf_pages.extracted_text: Kitchen Elevations - Sink Wall, Fridge Wall, Pantry Wall

page_metadata.title: Overview Elevations
page_metadata.notes: Shows 4 overview elevations: Sink Wall (Wolf Gas Range GR304, Zephyr Monsoon 30" AK9528AS, White Oak Floating Shelves with LED groove, Anderson P6035 Picture Window), Fridge Wall/Pantry (SubZero DET3050R), Island End Panel, New Pantry Wall (Paint Grade). Wolf Stainless Steel Splash/Shelf behind range. Interior wall blocking needed by GC for floating shelves.

page_metadata.title: Sink Wall
page_metadata.notes: Sink Wall detailed drawings with sections A-D. Lower: Double Recycle (Rev-A-Shelf 4WCSC2135DM2), Knife Block (Rev-A-Shelf 4WDKB1), Sink Base 36" (Shaws Lancaster RC3018-C Farm Sink, double plywood), 3-Drawer banks. Upper: Floating shelves, hood. Dishwasher: Miele DW G 5056 SCVi. Hardware: 18 hinge plates, 4x 21" BLUM slides. Finish: Paint Grade Maple/Medex, Prefinished Maple/Birch interior.

page_metadata.title: Fridge Wall
page_metadata.notes: Fridge Wall with sections D-E. SubZero DET3650RID integrated fridge with custom fridge panel (16 11/16"). Lemans II 6930140150 corner storage unit. 3-Drawer bank near fridge. 84" total height, 25" countertop depth. Hardware: 12 inset hinges, 12 hinge plates, 2x 21" BLUM slides. Finish: Paint Grade Maple/Medex.

page_metadata.title: Pantry
page_metadata.notes: Walk-In Pantry with 3 walls: Exterior Wall (39" full height, Flat Sawn White Oak doors), Full Height Wall Section F (open shelving), Workstation Wall (counter for Toaster oven, KitchenAid, distiller). Countertop TBD: Soapstone if enough leftover from kitchen, otherwise white oak. 3 locations require electrical outlet wiring. All hardware quantities zero (open shelving, no doors). **INSPIRATION PHOTO EMBEDDED** - Pantry Design Inspo image shows rustic wood shelving with baskets and jars.

page_metadata.title: Island
page_metadata.notes: Kitchen Island: 97 1/8" length x 21 3/4" depth. Front and Back elevations, End Panels x2, Plan View, Section Views H-I. All drawers (no doors): Left 3-Drawer bank, Center 2 Deep Drawers for Pots, Right 3-Drawer bank with top utensil divider. Both ends have space for electrical wiring. Hardware: 8 clip sets only. Finish: Paint Grade faces, Prefinished Maple/Birch interior.

page_metadata.title: Countertops
page_metadata.notes: Countertop layout showing all pieces with FE (Finished Edge) markers (14+ locations). Pitched drain grooves near sink area (24 1/4" x 12") for drying rack. Multiple countertop pieces: Sink area, Island (largest piece), Fridge wall L-shaped corner, Pantry counter. Total: 11 SF millwork countertops per cover page.

rooms.name: Main Kitchen
rooms.pdf_notes: Main kitchen area - Tier 4 Cabinetry per PDF cover scope
rooms.notes: Tier 4 Paint grade cabinets. 33.5 LF cabinet + 4 LF floating shelves.

rooms.name: Walk-In Pantry
rooms.pdf_notes: Walk-in pantry - Tier 2 Cabinetry per PDF cover scope
rooms.notes: Tier 2 Stain grade rift-sawn white oak. 11.5 LF per architectural drawings. Natural finish.

room_locations.name: Sink Wall
room_locations.notes: South-facing wall with window above sink. 156" total wall span.

room_locations.name: Fridge Wall
room_locations.notes: East wall with 36" wide refrigerator alcove. 126" total wall span.

room_locations.name: Island
room_locations.notes: Center island with seating overhang on north side. 90" x 42" footprint.
room_locations.countertop_notes: 12" seating overhang requires L-bracket support system

room_locations.name: Pantry Wall
room_locations.notes: Full height pantry storage. 138" total wall span.

cabinet_runs.name: Sink Wall Base & Upper Cabinets
cabinet_runs.notes: Base cabinets with sink base center. Wall cabinets flanking window.
cabinet_runs.finishing_notes: BM White Dove OC-17, semi-gloss on doors, satin on boxes

cabinet_runs.name: Fridge Wall & Upper Cabinets
cabinet_runs.notes: Tall fridge surround with panels. Utility cabinet and microwave base.
cabinet_runs.cnc_notes: Fridge opening 36" wide x 72" tall. Tall pantry, above fridge, utility with drawers, microwave base.

cabinet_runs.name: Kitchen Island
cabinet_runs.notes: Center island with seating overhang on north side. Trash pullout on south side.
cabinet_runs.labor_notes: 12" seating overhang requires L-bracket support system

cabinet_runs.name: Tall Pantry Storage
cabinet_runs.notes: Full height pantry cabinets with adjustable shelving. One section open shelving.
cabinet_runs.finishing_notes: Natural clear coat, satin sheen. Osmo Polyx-Oil recommended.
cabinet_runs.cnc_notes: Rift-sawn white oak. Shelf pin holes at 1.25" spacing.

cabinets.shop_notes: Standard base cabinet with full overlay doors

cabinets.hardware_notes: False front tilt-out for sponge storage
cabinets.custom_modifications: Sink base - no shelf, false front drawer
cabinets.shop_notes: Sink base with bottom cutout for plumbing access

cabinets.hardware_notes: Blum Tandem Plus soft-close undermount slides
cabinets.shop_notes: Drawer base - 3 equal drawers, dovetail maple boxes

cabinets.hardware_notes: Microwave shelf with adjustable tray above

cabinets.shop_notes: Island base - working side, pot and pan storage
Island drawer base, utensil and prep storage

cabinets.hardware_notes: Blum Clip Top 110 hinges, brushed nickel
cabinets.shop_notes: Tall pantry with adjustable shelves, canned goods storage
Tall pantry - upper shelves, lower drawers
Open shelving - no doors, fixed solid wood shelves

pullouts.description: 28" diameter kidney-shaped lazy susan, 2 shelf set

milestones.name: Design Approval
milestones.description: Client approval of cabinet layout, materials, and finishes

milestones.description: All materials and hardware ordered from suppliers

milestones.description: All materials received and inspected at shop

tasks.title: Upload architectural drawings
tasks.description: Upload PDF drawings from designer to project

tasks.title: Identify rooms from floor plan
tasks.description: Mark Main Kitchen and Pantry rooms on floor plan PDF

tasks.title: Create Sink Wall cabinet run
tasks.description: Define cabinet run for sink wall with all specifications and measurements

tasks.title: Create Fridge Wall cabinet run
tasks.description: Define cabinet run for fridge wall including fridge surround panels

tasks.title: Create Island cabinet run
tasks.description: Define cabinet run for kitchen island with seating overhang

tasks.title: Create Pantry cabinet run
tasks.description: Define cabinet run for pantry wall with open shelving section

tasks.title: Generate Bill of Materials
tasks.description: Calculate material requirements for all cabinet runs

tasks.title: Order plywood materials
tasks.description: Order maple and white oak plywood from supplier

tasks.title: Order hardware
tasks.description: Order Blum hinges, slides, and decorative pulls

tasks.title: Order finish supplies
tasks.description: Order BM White Dove paint and Osmo finish

tasks.title: CNC nest cabinet box components
tasks.description: Create CNC nesting layout for all cabinet box parts

tasks.title: Cut cabinet box components
tasks.description: Run CNC nested parts for all cabinet boxes

tasks.title: Edge band cabinet components
tasks.description: Apply edge banding to all visible cabinet edges

tasks.title: Assemble cabinet boxes
tasks.description: Glue and assemble all cabinet boxes

tasks.title: Build face frames
tasks.description: Mill and assemble face frames for all cabinets

tasks.title: Attach face frames to boxes
tasks.description: Glue and nail face frames to cabinet boxes

tasks.title: Build drawer boxes
tasks.description: Cut and assemble dovetail drawer boxes

tasks.title: Sand all components
tasks.description: Sand cabinets, doors, and drawers through 180 grit

tasks.title: Apply primer coat
tasks.description: Spray primer on all paint-grade components

tasks.title: Apply finish coats
tasks.description: Spray finish coats on all paint-grade components

tasks.title: Apply Osmo finish to pantry
tasks.description: Wipe on Osmo Polyx-Oil to all pantry components

tasks.title: Install drawer slides
tasks.description: Mount Blum Tandem slides in all drawer cabinets

tasks.title: Mount doors
tasks.description: Hang all doors and adjust alignment

tasks.title: Install shelves and accessories
tasks.description: Install adjustable shelves, lazy susan, trash pullout

tasks.title: Install decorative hardware
tasks.description: Install all pulls and knobs

tasks.title: Final QC inspection
tasks.description: Complete quality control checklist for all cabinets

tasks.title: Wrap and pack cabinets
tasks.description: Protective wrap all cabinets for shipping

tasks.title: Ship to Nantucket
tasks.description: Load truck and coordinate ferry transport to Nantucket

subtasks.title: Calculate solid wood requirements
subtasks.description: Calculate board feet needed for face frames

subtasks.description: Count hinges, slides, shelf pins, and pulls

subtasks.title: Calculate finishing supplies

subtasks.title: Assemble Sink Wall base cabinets

subtasks.title: Assemble Island cabinets

subtasks.title: Assemble Pantry cabinets

sales_order.name: SO-TCS-0001-FL
sales_order.note: Custom kitchen and pantry cabinetry for 25 Friendship Lane, Nantucket. Paint grade maple for kitchen, stain grade rift-sawn white oak for pantry. Includes island with seating overhang.

change_orders.change_order_description: Client requested additional spice rack pullout in island cabinet I1
change_orders.note: Add Rev-a-Shelf spice rack pullout to island cabinet I1. Includes hardware and installation.
